issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Click and double click events having unexpected behaviour in different controls within Scrollview.

*Click Event*
Scrollview click event not generated by nested children, When you click within child area in Scrollview its working fine.

*Double Click Event*
Double click is working fine nested children but ScrollVeiw child having problem in double click.
fields.summary: iOS: Scrollview click event not generated by child.

comments.body: Thanks for the report! Did it work with previous versions of the SDK? Also quick check: Are you using {{run-on-main-thread}}? If so, the issue is fixed in 6.1.0.RC.
Yes Its working on previous SDK.
